Home.subtitle: Is your wallet configuration really safe?
Home.description: This service aims to check the status of your wallet and update it safely as needed.
Home.alert: Currently, only the Domain and EmailHash features are implemented. Other items will be added in the future.

invest.title: Request for Support and Investment

descriptions.0: TrustlineChecker is a security-focused dashboard tool for safely operating accounts on the XRPL.
descriptions.1: Visualize your account's trusted tokens and issuers, detect vulnerabilities early, and support improving security literacy.

invest.contact: If you are interested, please feel free to contact us.

descriptions.0: TrustlineChecker is a security-focused dashboard tool for safely operating accounts on the XRPL.
descriptions.1: Visualize your account's trusted tokens and issuers, detect vulnerabilities early, and support improving security literacy.

context.title: The Invisible Risks Hidden in XRPL

descriptions.0: XRPL has a unique feature of having many settings that can be configured for accounts compared to other blockchains.
descriptions.1: This flexibility is both an advantage and a risk. If you use it without fully understanding the settings, you may end up with unintended vulnerabilities.
descriptions.2: This situation can lead to fraud and asset loss.

trend.title: The Era of Security Awareness in XRPL

descriptions.0: In recent years, the need for higher security on XRPL, such as stablecoins and RWA (Real World Asset), has increased.
descriptions.1: As a foundation for corporate use, account setting management and visualization have become essential elements in XRPL.

descriptions.0: TrustlineChecker is a security tool that allows anyone to easily check and manage their XRPL account status.
descriptions.1: Through the following features, it protects your assets.
descriptions.2: Not just a check tool, it also serves as a learning partner for understanding safe ways to use XRPL.

features.0: TrustLine List Display: Visualize trusted tokens and issuers
features.1: Risk Visualization: Automatically check for suspicious issuers and excessive settings
features.2: Setting Item Explanation: Explain the meaning and security risks of each setting
features.3: Learning Space: Design that makes learning XRPL security fun

vision.title: A Vision of a Safe XRPL Life for All Users

descriptions.0: TrustlineChecker aims to prevent asset damage from misconfiguration and misinterpretation.
descriptions.1: Anyone can easily understand their account status and use XRPL safely with a future where everyone can use XRPL with confidence.
descriptions.3: —That transparent and secure Web3 experience is supported by TrustlineChecker.
